text: Geraldo Rivera (born July 4, 1943, Manhattan, New York City) is an American attorney, journalist, author, reporter, and talk show host.http://www.foxnews.com/on-air/personalities/geraldo-rivera/bio/#s=r-z He almost always appears on Fox News. He hosted a talk show, Geraldo, which ran for eleven years and featured many controversial guests. He began hosting for Fox News not long after the attacks of September 11, 2001. He hosts Geraldo at Large. He has written six books. ==Books== * * * * * * ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Journalists from New York City Category:1943 births Category:Living people
